name: Project Ninja (m.zadz)
description:
"Project Ninja" is a placeholder name during the alpha development cycle of the game.

Experiance the adventures of several generations of ninjas with their own unique timeline.
Use your ancestral grappling hook to venture through different envronments and frantically destroy hordes of enemies and obstacles.
Play any timeline in any order you want and watch your actions effect other generations.
Defy the laws of time and space, when all the ninjas converge to defeat one common evil.

This game is in development. The game has a few levels (one environemnt) and two bosses. I am working on more features such as upgrades, abilities, more diversity in levels and more enemy types. I am going to redo the artwork too. At the moment, the demo shows of the main mecanic.

Project Ninja is an extension of my Ludum Dare 46 entry: Heart String.

Music by: Marek J Smagala & Hicksu

You can follow the progress of Project Ninja here:
